properties.areaDesc: Breton Sound; Chandeleur Sound; Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island out 20 NM; Mississippi Sound; Lake Borgne
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 12 at 1:45PM CST until February 13 at 6:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to 1/4 NM or less.

* WHERE...Mississippi Sound, Lake Borgne, Chandeleur Sound,
Breton Sound and Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to
Stake Island out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Thursday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Current Dense Fog Advisory has been
cancelled. A Dense Fog Advisory will go back into effect for the
same areas beginning at 6PM CST.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY
